title: Chrome for Android crashing immediately after launching
content:
Chrome crashes immediately after opening and continues to crash on subsequent attempts to open.

Behavior can be seen here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZHahyAvbeg

Have tried:
clearing cache
clearing storage
uninstalling Chrome to the base version and updating again

The crashing can be avoided for at least a few hours (usually less than 1 day) by restarting the phone.

The crashes don't happen if I don't turn on sync.

I can provide logcat output.


Please help, this problem is driving me bonkers, and keeping sync turned off is not a solution.
